t:
My best friend died yesterday.     

Her parents told me that she    
committed suicide.            


                     I always hate it when she takes credit for what I did.
c:
It's the last time she'll take credit for my work.



#bestfriend #parents #suicide #credit #fake #hate #murder #hide





Sometime you don't realize someone's importance unless they're gone. Maybe they just wanted to save you, who knows?
